column6: Adventures on Nu Earth! Ben and Johnny have big plans for a much needed vacation in the company of refugees from the future - booze, ladies, misadventures...and two stowaways named Franklin and Val.
column8: | penciller:Alan Davis | penciller:Dale Eaglesham | writer:Jonathan Hickman | colorist:Paul Mounts | colorist:John Rauch | letterer:Rus Wooton
